author: glenn
msg: Fix a memory leak when tracing abandoned connections.
Cleanup of passivate and close methods.

author: glenn
msg: FastArrayList wasn't useful, switched to synchronized methods to fix thread bug

author: glenn
msg: Bug fix, boolean properties were always set to false

author: glenn
msg: The Exception stack trace for an abondoned connections gets
generated when the connection is opened.  But the abandoned
connection can be reported and logged hours later.
Added a datestamp for when the db connection was created
so that it is easier to correlate the abandoned connection
to the request which created it.
